column1: Study for a successful environmental management careerThisEnvironmental Management for Business MScis designed to prepare you for a successful environmental management career working in business, the public sector or NGOs. Delivered in association with the globally renowned Cranfield School of Management, this course enables you to develop the advanced theoretical knowledge and practical skills required to critically evaluate complex environmental issues, develop effective strategies and lead their implementation.
FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
One year full-time, two-three years part-time
